title: Cheque book
text: A book of cheques i.e. “a printed form, used instead of money, to make payments from your bank account”

title: Coupon
text: “A stock is a share in the ownership of a company.”

title: Bonds
text: “A bond is an agreement to lend money to a company for a certain amount of time.”
suggestion: “Companies sell securities to people to get the money they need to grow. People buy securities as investments, or ways of possibly earning money.”

title: Mutual Funds
text: “a service where financial experts invest the money of many people in many different companies.”
suggestion: “Companies sell securities to people to get the money they need to grow. People buy securities as investments, or ways of possibly earning money.”
